name: Ursodiol

ingredients.name: SODIUM STARCH GLYCOLATE TYPE A POTATO

indications: ursodiol tablets indicated treatment patients primary biliary cholangitis ( pbc ) .
contraindications: • recommended adult : 13 15 mg/kg/day administered two four divided doses food . ( 2.1 ) • scored ursodiol 500 mg tablet : scored tablet broken halves provide recommended . ( 2.3 , 16.2 )
adverseReactions: patients complete biliary obstruction known hypersensitivity intolerance ursodiol components formulation .
indications_original: Ursodiol tablets are indicated for the treatment of patients with primary biliary cholangitis (PBC).
contraindications_original: • Recommended adult dosage: 13 to 15 mg/kg/day administered in two to four divided doses with food. ( 2.1 ) • Scored ursodiol 500 mg tablet: scored tablet can be broken in halves to provide recommended dosage. ( 2.3 , 16.2 )
adverseReactions_original: Patients with complete biliary obstruction and known hypersensitivity or intolerance to ursodiol or any of the components of the formulation.
